peril.ai

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.ai.AI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ernie, FinalBoss, Goat, Knight, Monkey, NegativeFiveIQ, Noob, Ocelot

    public abstract class AI
extends java.lang.Object
    An AI player of the game. This AI will perform an action based on the current state of the Board and the current state of the game. Any concrete instances of this must be state-less as the may be used by multiple Players.
    Since:
    2018-03-08
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    AIController

    • Field Detail

      • USER

        public static final AI USER
        The AI for a user controlled player. This AI does not support any operations and therefore can be used to detect a user controlled player.

      • MAX_SPEED

        public static final int MAX_SPEED
        The minimum number of milliseconds between each action of this AI.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • name

        public final java.lang.String name
        The name of this AI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AI

        public AI(java.lang.String name,
          int defaultSpeed,
          AIController api)
        Constructs a new AI.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this AI.
        defaultSpeed - The number of milliseconds between each action of this AI. If this is zero or lower then the then the AI will perform its actions at the frame rate of the display.
        api - The AIController that this AI will use to query the state of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • reinforce

        public final boolean reinforce(int delta)
        Performs the reinforce operations of this AI.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time (in milliseconds) that has elapsed since the last time this method was called.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this AI wishes to perform another operation or not.

        Returns:
        Whether or not this AI wishes to perform another operation or not.

        public final boolean fortify(int delta)
        Performs the fortify operations of this AI.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time (in milliseconds) that has elapsed since the last time this method was called.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this AI wishes to perform another operation or not.

      • setSpeed

        public final void setSpeed(int speed)
        Set the number of milliseconds between each action of this AI.
        Parameters:
        speed - The new speed of the AI.

      • getSpeed

        public final int getSpeed()
        Retrieves the speed of this AI.
